description: This editor trumps paid proprietary editors like Caret
This is the best markdown editor
It looks very capable of editing .md files and is very aesthetically pleasing. It seems to support all features from usual .md sources and is all around nice to use.
summary: Very easy to use and beautiful

description:
i really like the immediate reformatting of the markdown as as i type. and the switch back to the markdown syntax when i cursor over text is sharp too. it has a few points where it still has some difficulty (when trying to delete code blocks), but i imagine this will be fixed in future versions.

i also like the file list pane to pull up markdown documents (notes) within the app versus a dialog for folders. and having multiple files open as tabs is also very convenient.
summary: probably the most clever markdown editor i've used

description: I really enjoy this editor. I hope they will update this to the latest version
I really like it. It is not heavy and distraction free.

There are a handful of good or even great Markdown editors out there for Linux but this one takes the cake. Some editors allow you to view a live preview of your markdown as you type, but this is generally in a split screen layout. "Mark Text" takes previewing to a whole new level by formatting each raw line of markdown as you type. In all the editors I have used for writing markdown, this is the first time I have seen this. On top of that this editor looks and feels pleasant with a nice handful of light and dark themes. The default layout reminds me of "Zen Mode" in Visual Studio Code, or another editor known as "Ghost Writer". This is to say it is very minimal up front which makes it easier to focus on writing content. I highly recommend this editor to anyone who enjoys writing in markdown and likes to have suggestions offered to them as they type. Making a table is trivial with Mark Text which is something I never quite got right when trying to create tables on my own. 5/5 stars and much love to the developers.
It's a very good software

I'm very impressed with this software! It's mighty easy to structure documents with. It doesn't yet deserve 5 stars in my opinion, because certain features need some work. As an example: when pressing CTRL+I for typing cursive, two asterisks are generated on each side around your text, because this is the markdown way. The annoying this is, you actually have to make sure these asterisks keep connected to your text, and when you're done typing in cursive, instead of pressing CTRL+I again, you have to manually get your cursor out of the asterisks.
summary: Works well, needs some work on some parts

description: Simple, light, reactive, full of features

The app is great to use but the markdown produced is somewhat unexpected. For example, it add two space at the start of every line and add an empty line after every list item. If you use only this app to write markdown and export it to PDF or HTML, it's fine. But if you want to process the markdown using external tools like Pandoc, the output may be unexpected.
summary: Good app but produces unexpected markdown

description: There are lot of nice things to say about the interface, dark-mode and colour schemes are great. However, the markdown files need heavy editing afterwards to fix lists.
summary: Interface is nice, markdown code is a mess

description: this app is showing around 750mb at 50% download

This is one of the only WYSIWYG Markdown editors you'll find, which imho is much more useful and intuitive than the standard 2 page layout. Flawlessly renders anything I throw at it: pure Markdown, HTML tags, Latex. Has a very clean interface, very good shortcuts and overall fantastic piece of engineering.
summary: Handsdown best markdown editor i've ever used

description: Probably the best markdown editor for linux. Only downside is that it is electron based
simply Elegant, Clean and Efficient...

Pros:
it's almost like a "WYSIWYG" - rendering the Markdown in such an intuitive way.
it's support for Mermaid and other charting/diagramming stuff is fantastic
themes make it nice to read and work with at different times of the day.
cons:
still a bit slow in large files, lots of performance improvement possibilities.
I found this app while looking for something to take school notes in and it has proved to be a stable and feature filled little editor for my needs.
Stylish and actually quite useful for meeting note taking, or for creating TODO lists. Took too long to find this app. Quick to download and start, and with no bugs encountered so far.

This is a one of the best markdown editors till date. It also respects native window theme so it doesn't look out of place. Very good for beginner as well advanced usage. However, I couldn't find an option for enabling side pane which could provide a live preview. Its not a must but in my opinion it should be there for those who want it. It would be more appealing for some users if it could be lighter on system resources..
summary: Very nice. Best markdown editor I have used

description:
I just go on recommending this to my fellow researchers. Primarily... for Note Taking and ToDo lists.

I use it for complex tasks such as template designing for the official websites and creating tutorials for fellow mates.
Makes a lot of fun to use, but in particular export to different file formats could be enhanced. Pandoc is desperately needed with this. Else it is just half as powerfull.
I love that there is a beautiful elegant app like this to compare to Obsidian and compete against their licensing. I can't wait to see this program develop.
summary: Beautiful beginning, so much potential, I am a supporter

description: Beautiful.Elegant.Rich Feature's.Ease of Use.
This is probably the best markdown editor for Linux out there. It's simple, elegant, great UI, functionality-wise it has everything that you need. Really recommend it!
The best for linux
It doesn't preview raw HTML, such as form elements
This is a great alternative to other propietary apps like Typora. The only thing i'm missing is a good search function for when you've opened ýour notes folder and need to quickly find one.

I needed an editor handling [toc] and tables comfortably - Mark Text had all the features but I didn't like how it looked.

However, both top menu bar CAN be changed from "Windows-ish" to native GNOME style and the dark theme can switch automatically according to current system settings.

Thank you for great work!
It has all the features I was looking for and works on multiple platforms too. Excellen app!
one of the best out there and very easy to use loved it!!
One of the best and simpelest Markdown editors out there!

Typewriter mode is broken, but I don't need that anyway. Wish it has search function and tags - especially tags. But, I am trying to move most of my files into .md, so this app is great. It allows you to make internal or external links....even links to .rtf files within a note.
Wish I could resize the window even smaller, but it does resize somewhat small.
summary: My new favorite, but not perfect

description: Need to connect to something like pandoc to increase the export options. Still, it a great choice for a writing app that handles markdown well. Works with text files stored in folders and not some proprietary format.
summary: Great live preview, needs better export options

description: Hat viele sehr gute Feature. Das einzige, was mir fehlt ist eine Rechtschreibkorrektur.
Beautiful markdown editor, works very well but an option to include pictures in the markdown documents would be nice
Me gusta ahora más que Typora, pero me gustaría que fuese posible cambiar y hacer temas como con Typora.
summary: El mejor editor de markdown con visualización instantanea

description: El mejor y más intuitivo editor de Markdown para el escritorio. Su interfaz y usabilidad son impecables, sin necesidad de dividir la pantalla para ver el resultado.

Excellente efficacité.
Rendre export Wysiwyg (dark theme) et ce sera parfait.
Jolie, ergonomique, fonctionnel, agréable, à télécharger immédiatement !
Пользуюсь онлайн версией другого редактора, думал попробовать оффлайн. Но похоже пока дальше буду пользоваться онлайн редактором.
summary: Работает, но много весит и притормаживает

description:
这个软件相当不错，值得推荐！
1. 降低了学习成本，一个“@”就能插入自己想要的东西；
2. 方便导出HTML，PDF格式
3. 支持自动保存！

对了，只要你英语够好，这个软件就非常适合你！
